headline: Workday Recognized as a Leader in 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Cloud ERP for Service-Centric Enterprises for Fourth Consecutive Year
summary: Workday, Inc. (NASDAQ: WDAY), the enterprise AI platform for managing people, money, and agents, has been named a Leader in the 2025 Gartner Magic Quadrant for Cloud ERP for Service-Centric Enterprises for the fourth year in a row. A complimentary copy of the report is available here.

raw.summary: Workday, Inc. (NASDAQ: WDAY), the enterprise AI platform for managing people, money, and agents, has been named a Leader in the 2025 Gartner Magic Quadrant for Cloud ERP for Service-Centric Enterprises for the fourth year in a row. A complimentary copy of the report is available here.

headline: Workday's Higher Education Momentum Accelerates as Over 650 Institutions Worldwide Turn to AI to Navigate Uncertainty and Transform the Student Experience
summary: Workday, Inc. (NASDAQ: WDAY), the enterprise AI platform for managing people, money, and agents, today announced significant global momentum in the higher education industry, with more than 650 institutions across 19 countries having selected Workday to drive their transformations. This milestone underscores the growing demand for Workday Human Capital Management (HCM), Workday Financial Management, and Workday Student, as institutions leverage these AI-powered solutions to support student and e

headline: Lattice Joins Workday Partner Program to Power the Future of People + AI
summary: Lattice, a leading HR platform where people and AI succeed together, today announced it has joined the Workday Partner Program.

raw.headline: Lattice Joins Workday Partner Program to Power the Future of People + AI

headline: NetApp Launches Enterprise-Grade Data Platform to Power AI Innovation
summary: NTAP's new AFX and AIDE offerings redefine enterprise data infrastructure, enabling secure, scalable and AI-ready performance across hybrid clouds.

raw.headline: NetApp Launches Enterprise-Grade Data Platform to Power AI Innovation

headline: Workday Adds to AI Push With $200 Million Investment in Irish Innovation Center
summary: The business-software company said the center would create 200 jobs specialized in artificial intelligence as it works to scale up its AI offer.

raw.headline: Workday Adds to AI Push With $200 Million Investment in Irish Innovation Center
